I'm going to be completely honest. - m4w - 28 (bayside)

age : 28

So I figured I'll be completely honest and just put it all out there so there's no confusion. I am a 28 year old male who is working full time, in school full time and is in a relationship. The reason I'm on here is that there is not excitement in my life at the moment. Nothing has really made me smile in a while and I figured I would give this a shot. I don't know if this is just what life becomes, boring and routine but I can't believe that is all it can be . I'm looking to make a connection with someone even if its just to talk and get to know. A new friend and someone I can be 100% honest with. Someone I can be myself with and not have to be worried about being judged or looked at like I'm crazy. Hopefully your out there. I know I'm probably going to get a lot of negative responses from this by women but I'm sure there's someone out there that feels the same way I do. I'm looking for a woman who is between 35-45 and who is willing to give this a shot. A little older or younger is fine but around these ages. I have many interest and would love to explore each other and get to know each other. I would love for us to be each others outlet in a otherwise stressful and routine life. If your interested just drop me a line with you pic and a little about yourself..I have pictures of myself to show you as well, just not going to post them all over the internet . thanks and I hope to hear from you soon.
